${ModID}:NatureOrb.NAME: Nature Orb
${ModID}:NatureOrb.FLAVOR: Plants spring to life around this if left alone too long.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#3e90f4]Water [#3e90f4]Orb. At the start of each combat, #y${ModID}:Plant #b3 #ySaplings.

${ModID}:WaterOrb.NAME: Water Orb
${ModID}:WaterOrb.FLAVOR: It seems to contain an unlimited amount of clean water.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #y${ModID}:Plant a #ySapling and #y${ModID}:Water it #b2 times.
